mapper.select: select count(*) from tblAttendance a inner join stubycur b on a.sseq = b.seq inner join curopen c on b.curopenseq = c.seq inner join manager d on c.managerseq = d.seq where a.day = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select a.seq from stubycur a inner join curopen b on a.curopenseq = b.seq inner join manager c on b.managerseq = c.seq inner join member d on a.seq = d.seq where enddate > sysdate and managerSeq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into tblAttendance (seq, sseq, aseq, day) values (tblAttendance_seq.nextval, #{stuSeq}, 1, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
